tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
He is Very Patient, Calm and Very Friendly. Doctor is very patient explaining the problem in detail. It is not the "Doctor - Patient" discussion that happen between us. For me it is more like talking to my Friend who cares for me and my child. He makes me so comfortable that I can ask any doubt I have. He still listens patiently until I complete and then explain his views on the same in detail, in the language I understands. He makes sure that the baby is very comfortable in his hands. One day it happened that he called up another Doctor on a second opinion when I was sitting right there. I was impressed to know that he won't suggest or recommend something unless until he is completely sure about it.

I finalized Dr. Kishan Kumar after consulting 4 other pediatricians. 

Thank you Doctor.
reply_text: Thank you for the kind words.

review: ** ** *** ** *** **** ****** * *** ****** He is very friendly, I had been visiting him from my first child  now going for second
reply_text: Thank you for the kind words.

review:
**** *************
We Visit Doc Kishan for our kid from past 4 years. Right treatment and support and patience makes this doctor stands unique.

He is very friendly with kids , make them talk to him and provides proper treatment.

Thanks for all the patience and treatment doctor
reply_text: Thank you for the kind words.

review:
we are consulting this doctor since my baby born for all his vaccinations./health related issues. he is very good doctor. only problem is with supportive staff who is failed to manage patients. 

I would request doctor to take care of that part. 

Thank you.

Got appointment through practo and was on time. Gave very little medicines, no injection nor antibiotic. Explains in detail, takes time , explains problem. Kid recovered two days of fever, throats pain and vomiting. High recommendation and wish all doctors are like him.

For any problem related to general cold/cough or fever for my kid , I am visiting this clinic from past 2 years. 

I see this doctor is always providing the quick & permanent solution by listening all the problem that we mentioned.

He also discuss about nutrition feeds for kids.

Finally I feel that it is more worthy for the given fee.

I have visited the doctor for the first time for baby vaccines and regular baby aliments clarifications. Kishan sir is very friendly, informative. Explanation is good and clarified all our doubts. We felt a friendly environment. Newbies can consult him without any second thought.
reply_text: Thank you for the kind words.

review: Visited him for my 5months old baby who is going through lots of Constipation.. Wait time was 1 min,  very soft spoken person, but speaks very little. Best part he checked baby properly, gave almost 20min to us, understood our problem and then suggested food and fruits which will be helpful to pass him stool properly.Over all good and satisfied experience :)

I went for my son he was having fever and doctor suggested us for test and send report on my WhatsApp but when i send report card he just said blood count have reduce. I called for how he can improve he didn't replied properly **** ********** ** **** ** *** **** ********* He said don't call again and again for small small things
reply_text: I had asked you to come to clinic next day. Hope you have met doctor.

review: The doctor was very good and explanation regarding the health issue was good.The first good pediatrician I ever experienced in my life.He even picked the call when I called him midnight as my baby started to puke and wasn't sleeping and he answered and made us comfortable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I consulted Dr Kishan Kumar for my 11 month old baby.. he is highly efficient.. listened to my baby's health issues very keenly and suggested syrups/medicines.. Did very thorough check up.. Answered all my queries patiently.. 
My daughter recovered in 1 day.. Queried about my baby's waitloss which was present by birth, gave good suggestions..
I am extremely satisfied, highly recommend this doctor..
reply_text: Thank you for the kind words.

review: We visited the doctor for viral fever of my 8 month old baby boy..The doctor approach was very impressive. Since, my child has high fever, he immediately gave a suppository. Suggested a blood test, to rule out bacterial infection where most of the doctors usually prescribes an antibiotic, anti pyretic etc.,he gave us a diaper rash cream free of cost after seeing my son’s rash. May God bless him and his family with all the happiness...!!! Must visit paediatrician in HSR.

We visited for our son's cold and fever consultation. The doctor was simply great. With great care he checked him, listened to us and clarified our concerns. The clinic is clean and very well maintained. The staff was very efficient. We especially liked the way they manage appointment and prescription online and fully computerised. Highly recommended.

We are very pleased with Dr. Kishan Kumar. We took our child for cough for 1 week. He examined and asked us to get chest x-ray immediately to look for foreign body. He diagnosed my child to have foreign body in lungs. He spoke to the pediatric surgeon and asked to go to the hospital by 5 am after overnight fasting. The surgeon removed the foreign body by bronchoscopy. Dr Kishan took care of us after the procedure also. God bless him.

My child was suffering from galactosemia, I had shown to many paediatricians, nobody identified the reason for illness. One of my colleague suggested to meet Dr.Kishan in HSR Layout. I have taken my child to Dr.Kishan and he diagnosed correctly and gave an excellent treatment. I personally feel his hand is good. Thanks a lot Sir.

I have been taking my daughter to Dr. Kishan and I am completely satisfied with him. He takes care of my child very well and knows how to handle babies. He never gives high dosage of medicines until it is a must. Dr. Kishan also gives consultation on phone and recommends medicine on phone itself where there is an emergency.

Excellent and experienced doctor. Diagnoses well and kind attention given to all our queries and spends sufficient time. He is one of the best paediatrician I have found in HSR Layout. The environment at the clinic is also very hygenic and children friendly.
Doctor is friendly and explained everything with the actual facts. And got answers for what we were wondering off.
reply_text: Thank you for the kind words.

review: My 2.5 year old son was suffering with High fever, cough and vomiting for last 3 days. Visited Dr. Kishan Kumar and he is very polite and listened carefully to my issue. Suggested to avoid antibiotics and prescribed paracetamol for fever and medicine for cough and vomit. I would definitely recommend Dr. Kishan Kumar for pediatrics.
reply_text: Thanks for the feedback. Hope he is doing fine.

review: We went to show our daughter who had fever and cold.. Doctor gave lot of time to explain our concerns..the analysis done by doctor is very good.. Explained the things.. Prescribed minimal medication..appointment was on time.. Thank you so much doctor..

It is my first visit and this what I noticed.

reply_text: Thank you for the feedback. My apologies for inconvenience. We sincerely try to see the patients at the given appointment time. But at times we have to spend more time for some kids who are more sick or who need some extra counselling or some detailed evaluation. We also have to take care of kids who come in between the appointments who are sick. We will try our best to avoid inconvenience. Thank you.
